SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.pimslims.business.crystallization.service
Interface ScreenService

All Superinterfaces:
BaseService, PropertyNameConvertor<ScreenView>, ViewService<ScreenView>
public interface ScreenService
    
extends BaseService, ViewService<ScreenView>





The ScreenService API is the interface through which XtalPiMS Screens are
managed. The interface declares the methods available to record and access
Screens.







    
Author:

    
Ian Berry

                             throws BusinessException

    specified org.pimslims.crystallization.WellPosition of the
    specified org.pimslims.crystallization.Plate.

        SubPosition) to use
